name: BNY Mellon Strategic Growth Ventures
overview:
BNY Mellon Strategic Growth Ventures acts as a focal point of growth and innovation for BNY Mellon by investing in early stage financial services companies and related businesses that maximize portfolio value and accelerate BNY Mellon’s business model in global markets.

In this role, we source and manage a portfolio of investments that are catalysts for strategic change, provide innovative approaches to either tactical or strategic business challenges, complement existing business lines and/or expand targeted markets.

Target investments:

Early stage financial services companies with a working prototype

First round of institutional money

Minority interest investments

Contact:SGV@bnymellon.com

BNY Mellon is a global financial services company offering superior investment management and investment services. It has $25.9 trillion in assets under custody and administration and $1.2 trillion in assets under management. BNY Mellon is the corporate brand of The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation.
